resources.string: This app is completely based on Camera and Storage features.Please provide these permissions.
For any enquiries contact us at royston@gmail.com

Emotion Based Music Player is developed by Royston Furtado,Atharva More & Jay Bhatt who are a team of IT Engineers pursuing their BE from Mumbai University.We came up with an innovative idea of improving user\'s experience by automating music player such that it can play music based on your mood so that you don\'t have to worry about searching and selecting it every time.
